properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (test configuration).
